name: Peach Room
description:
This is a lonely place, a house filled with "dice" and "cards"...

...

Peach Room was an experimental project in which I tried out whatever kind of simulation I can make with help of Chapbook story format in Twine.  So said, there isn't much plot or a story going on--only a "dream" of a whimsical kind of place to explore.

NOTE: your game progress is saved in the browser, so even if you leave the page and come back later, you will still be in the same room. To reset the game, you either reach the end of it, or reset through the PC in the Drawing Room... but you'll need a secret password found in the end anyway uwu) Another option is to play in different browser, or device, or clear your cache.

NOTE2: you won't be able to play the game in incognito mode!! You can take off your disguise, no worry, no nsfw stuffs here :d 

Feel free to tell me if you find anything concerning with the game!
